data.comment: The match has started at Yankee Stadium.
Goal! New York City have got their heads in front thanks to a Alexandru Mitrita strike.
In the minute 1, Anton Tinnerholm instrumental with a fine assist.
Valentin Castellanos (New York City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 4, Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Cincinnati drive upfield and Allan Cruz gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New York City defender.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to New York City.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Cincinnati.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of New York City.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
New York City are whistled for offside.
In the minute 11, In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a New York City throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
In the minute 13, Free kick for New York City in the half of Cincinnati.
New York City push forward at Yankee Stadium and Ismael Tajouri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cincinnati defence.
Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
New York City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Cincinnati at Yankee Stadium.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Ronald Matarrita of New York City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Yankee Stadium.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 20, Cincinnati are caught offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bronx.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Cincinnati's Frankie Amaya misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
Frankie Amaya of Cincinnati smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 25, New York City take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Anton Tinnerholm.
Great play from Ismael Tajouri to set up the goal.
Can New York City capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 28, New York City are coming forward and Alexandru Mitrita gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Armando Villarreal awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick New York City.
New York City drives forward and Alexandru Mitrita gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 31, Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
Alexander Callens (New York City) gets a yellow card.
Cincinnati drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
New York City are pushing forward but Alexander Ring's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 36, Armando Villarreal awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati just outside New York City's area.
Alexander Ring is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Cincinnati pushes forward through Jurgen Locadia, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 39, Jesus Medina (New York City) has replaced the possibly injured Alexander Ring at Yankee Stadium.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bronx.
In the minute 43, Goal! New York City extend their lead to 3-0 through Alexandru Mitrita.
James Sands with an assist there.
Throw-in for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
In the minute 45, Valentin Castellanos for New York City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Throw-in New York City.
Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mathieu Deplagne is replacing Tom Pettersson for Cincinnati at Yankee Stadium.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick New York City.
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for New York City, close to Cincinnati's area.
In the minute 48, Free kick for New York City in the half of Cincinnati.
Corner awarded to New York City.
Valentin Castellanos hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for New York City!
In the minute 51, Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Goal kick for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
In the minute 53, Cincinnati's Joseph-Claude Gyau is on target but unsuccessful.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andrew Gutman.
It seems as if Andrew Gutman is unable to continue. Greg Garza replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 57, In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jaap Stam is making the team's third substitution at Yankee Stadium with Caleb Stanko replacing Frankie Amaya.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
Ronald Matarrita (New York City) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 64, Free kick New York City.
Kendall Waston (Cincinnati) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 66, Valentin Castellanos (New York City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New York City.
New York City's Ismael Tajouri gets in a shot on goal at Yankee Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, New York City's Alexandru Mitrita misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bronx.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
In the minute 70, Important block from the Cincinnati defence as Alexandru Mitrita fires in a strike for New York City.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 71, Free kick for New York City in the half of Cincinnati.
The away team have replaced Allan Cruz with Yuya Kubo. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jaap Stam.
Haris Medunjanin is booked for the away team.
Cincinnati attack but Brandon Vazquez's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 72, Armando Villarreal awards New York City a goal kick.
Cincinnati are coming forward and Jurgen Locadia gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
In the minute 74, New York City's Ismael Tajouri has run offside.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 77, Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Ronny Deila (New York City) is making a second substitution, with Gary Mackay Steven replacing Ismael Tajouri.
Ronny Deila is making the team's third substitution at Yankee Stadium with Gudmundur Thorarinsson replacing Ronald Matarrita.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Valentin Castellanos for New York City has been booked by Armando Villarreal and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 79, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Cincinnati close to the penalty box.
In Bronx, Kendall Waston (Cincinnati) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Free kick New York City.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
New York City to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
In the minute 84, In Bronx, Alexandru Mitrita of New York City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Valentin Castellanos (New York City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Nicolas Acevedo is replacing Keaton Parks for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
New York City make their fifth substitution with Tony Rocha replacing Alexandru Mitrita.
New York City are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 88, It's now 4-0 in Bronx as Jesus Medina scores for New York City.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Corner awarded to New York City.
New York City's Valentin Castellanos goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in for Cincinnati at Yankee Stadium.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of Cincinnati.
Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cincinnati's half?
Gary Mackay Steven gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York City.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 4-0.
